name: Levitaste
description:
Welcome to Levitaste!

You play the role of a psychic chef who's too lazy to grab their own ingredients. To top it all off, the kitchen's going crazy! 

- See how many wacky levels you can complete! 

- Bonus stars for collecting the spice, and finishing in decent amount of time!

- Stars can be collected in any order. 

-Press 'Q' or 'Esc' to return to the main menu and try the level again.

This game was inspired greatly by one of the earlier sections in the fantastic Unity game development course: https://www.udemy.com/unitycourse2/learn/v4/. If you enjoyed this, and are interested in creating your own games, I highly recommend it.

Music: http://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music
